title: Error (Possibly unintuitive) print value for a Tensor
body_html:
Issue description

In the example below, when printing the value of Tensor, it seems to show multiplication by 1e-3 along with the Tensor's value.

Code example

import torch
print(torch.Tensor([0.001])

Output

tensor(1.00000e-03 *
       [ 0.0010])

System Info

Please copy and paste the output from our

Collecting environment information...
PyTorch version: 0.5.0a0+0703357
Is debug build: No
CUDA used to build PyTorch: 9.1.85

OS: Ubuntu 18.04 LTS
GCC version: (Ubuntu 7.3.0-16ubuntu3) 7.3.0
